full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,KHYUNG NAG MKHA' LDING DBANG PO'I SGRUB THABS BYABS BSRUNG DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (YE SHES YI DAM RDO RJE MKHA' LDING NAG PO'I SGRUB THABS BYABS BSRUNG DANG BCAS PA 'DI RIGS RUS KYIS MNGON PAR MTHO BA'I BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG DANG LDAN TSE RING DBANG POS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG GIS ZHES ZER BA LA BRTEN NAS, ,SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG DGA' LDAN SHAR RTZE MKHAN PO SHRI LA'I @010A *, ,MING CAN RATNA DHARMA R'A DZ'A DAM PA GONG MA MAN NGAG LAS GZHI BYAS NAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG RGYAL MTSAN NO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: SHRI LA'I MING CAN RATNA DHARMA R'A DZ'A,
